entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 08:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
